channel.title: CNN.com - Top Stories
channel.description: CNN.com delivers up-to-the-minute news and information on the latest top stories, weather, entertainment, politics and more.
channel.copyright: Copyright 2014 Cable News Network LP, LLLP.

item.title: Concordia reaches end of last voyage
item.description: The crippled Costa Concordia cruise ship is nearing the end of its final voyage.

item.title: Source: Suicide blast kills 5 in Nigeria
item.description: A suicide bomber in Nigeria killed at least five people on Sunday in an attack on a church in the city of Kano, a local resident told CNN. There was no immediate claim of responsibility.

item.title: Did Boko Haram abduct official's wife?
item.description: Gunmen suspected to be Boko Haram Islamists on Sunday abducted the wife of the Cameroonian deputy prime minister in a dawn attack on his home village of Kolofata, north of the area where they also kidnapped a local chief and his family, residents and security sources said.

item.title: People power in the PRC
item.description: He saw it first-hand on a reporting trip in Guizhou province -- scores of village children going to school hungry.
